wikipedia_page.main: Sir Alfred Cardew Dixon, 1st Baronet Warford FRS (May 22, 1865 – May 4, 1936) was an English mathematician.

response: Dixon was born on 27 November 1867 in Pickering, North Riding of Yorkshire to G.T. Dixon, and was the younger brother of Alfred Cardew Dixon. From 1879 to 1885 he studied at Kingswood School, before matriculating at Worcester College, Oxford as a scholar to study mathematics.
